mapper.insert: insert into t_api (id, suite_id, api_url, api_name, api_desc, api_request_type, api_request_content_type, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{id},#{suiteId},#{apiUrl},#{apiName},#{apiDesc},#{apiRequestType},#{apiRequestContentType},#{createdAt},#{createdBy},#{updatedAt},#{updatedBy});
mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_api where 1=1
and suite_id=#{suiteId}
and api_url like concat("%", #{apiUrl}, "%")
and api_name like concat("%", #{apiName}, "%")

select a.id as id, s.suite_name as suiteName, a.api_url as apiUrl, a.api_name as apiName, a.api_desc as apiDesc, a.api_request_type as apiRequestType, a.created_at as createdAt from t_api a inner join t_suite s on a.suite_id = s.id where 1=1
and suite_id=#{suiteId}
and api_url like concat("%", #{apiUrl}, "%")
and api_name like concat("%", #{apiName}, "%")
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
